info.title: Issuer server
info.description:
*List APIs for Issuer Portal* 
 ## Introduction 
 This API is documented for **Issuer Server**. 
 ## Authentication 
 **Issuer server** use **Jwz Token** for authentication.

parameters.name: issuerId
parameters.description: DID of Issuer Server that you want to login to.

requestBody.description: You must send your ZKProofs for login to Issuer Server.

post.description: Verify a JWZ Token and return true if this token is valid.

parameters.name: issuerId
parameters.description: DID of Issuer Server what you want to login to.

isValid.description: Return true if your JWZ token is valid, else return false

get.description: Generate proof input for claim login
API to get all issuers is registed in this server.

numHolders.description: Number Holders in this Issuer Servers.

post.description: Register a new Issuer by PublicKey

claimId.description: Id of Claims to generate input for zkProof Login to this Issuer.

put.description: Restore latest state in block chain of Issuer

claimId.description: Id of Claims to generate input for zkProof Login to this Issuer.

get.description: Get all Operator's information of Issuer

claimId.description: Id of Claims to generate input for zkProof to login to this Issuer.

activate.description: True if this Operator is active

activateDate.description: Time stamp when this Operator is created

claimId.description: Id of Claims to generate input for zkProof Login to this Issuer.

numHolders.description: Number Holders in this Issuer Servers.

get.description: Get lastest auth claim path of issuers
Search claims by issuerId, status, holderId, schemaHash or claimId

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: search by PENDING | ACTIVE | REVIEWING | REJECT | PENDING_REVOKE | REVOKED

items.description: search by PENDING | ACTIVE | REVIEWING | REJECT | PENDING_REVOKE | REVOKED

holderId.description: DID of Holder who owns this claim

issuerId.description: DID of Issuer who issues this claim

get.description: Entry and Raw data of claim that Issuer isse for holder

post.description: Holder request Issuer issue a Claim

encodeClaim.description: Claim data encoded by PublicKey of Holder

post.description: Issuer issue array claims for holders

get.description: Query proof input for generate witness of claims
Issuer get Publish Challange to Publish ***ALL PENDING CLAIM***
Issuer get Challenge to Revoke ***ALL PENDING_REVOKE CLAIM***

get.summary: Get challenge to publish and revoke claim
get.description: Get challenge to publish PENDING claim and revoke PENDING_REVOKE claim

post.description: Issuer Publish ***ALL PENDING CLAIMS***. Then update new State of Issuer Tree to block chain
Revoke all PENDING_REVOKE claims. Then update new State of Issuer Tree to block chain
Publish all PENDING claims and Revoke all PENDING_REVOKE claims. Then update new State of Issuer Tree to block chain
Request create a schema. **ZIDEN** will review and accept if this schema is valid.

get.description: API Get input form schema by SchemaHash. Type of fieldData will be Standard Type.

@id.description: Slot in claim to save this data

post.description: Create new registry services for issuer

get.description: Find Registry Service by SchemaHash, IssuerId or NetworkId
Get a Network information by NetworkId

@context.description: List context url use in this schema

@id.description: Slot in claim to save this data

expiration.description: Expiration data of claims created by this registry

holderId.description: DID of Holder who request new claim

registryId.description: Id of registry what holder want to create claim

publicKey.description: Data response will be encoded by publicKey

holderId.description: DID of Holder who request new claim

registryId.description: Id of registry what holder want to create claim

@context.description: List context url use in this schema

@id.description: Slot in claim to save this data

expiration.description: Expiration data of claims created by this registry
Expiration data of claims created by this registry

numClaims.description: Number claims are created by this registry
